name: open field
description:
write out your thoughts and feelings or rant into an open field in the countryside. say what you want with no regrets: all the messages will fade away.

get that weight off your chest.

listen along to some ambiance and chill lo-fi tracks, or click the corresponding buttons to mute

music:
🍂   another log on the fire by s. lyre
🍂   More Sunshine by AYEON
🍂   Your Struggle Is Also Mine by Xavi
